messages.subject: RE Nimhs island
messages.msgSnippet: Hello Joanna, Thankyou for that.I will keep it till she is a bit older and maybe take our 8 yr old and her friend.They seem ok to handle most things. I know
messages.messageBody:
Hello Joanna,
Thankyou for that.I will keep it till she is a bit older and maybe take our 8 yr old and her friend.They seem ok to handle most things.

I know what you mean about some kids watching more scarey things than others.Our 8 yr old was watching harry 3 at the cinemas when she was 4 1/2 ans didnt worry about it..she has always been good with real vs fantasy.She recently saw the movie Bella which was PG here.I thought it would be better than a M movie but in the end I think it would have been better to see the movie for the older audience than to tackle the issues Bella brought up....it wasnt a kids movie but the reviewer said suitable for everyone.This is why i asked about info on Nimhs Island from those with children who have seen it!

Luna


Get the name you always wanted with the new y7mail email address.
www.yahoo7.com.au/y7mail
